Fizz

  • About
  • Contributing
  • Tutorials
  • Colophon

Fizz is a library written in Scala to pass the FizzBuzz test.

Fizz is currently an experimental project under active development. Feedback and contributions are welcomed as we look to improve the project.

Getting Started

Fizz is currently available for Scala 2.11.

Add instructions on how to get started.
